Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product. This item holds immense significance and worth to me, reflecting its exceptional quality and craftsmanship. Considering its rarity and the effort put into it, I am extending this exclusive offer to you at a price of $750000. I believe this price reflects the true value of the product while also allowing you to secure a remarkable asset at a favorable rate. I look forward to discussing the details with you and potentially welcoming this masterpiece into your collection. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $750,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $750,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
